articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Thai Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Thai Ambassador
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam,  president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Piamsak Milintachinda, Thai ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 After receiving it, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Greetings to King of Jordan
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Jordan 
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Abdullah â…¡, king of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan, on its 65th independence day.
					 Kim in the message wished the king happiness in good health and the friendly Jordanian people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Recently Disclosed U.S. Nuclear Ambition
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Recently Disclosed U.S. Nuclear Ambition
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- A recent issue of the Japanese Asahi Shimbun opened to the public the fact that the United States pressured Japan to permit and connive at the military actions for its nuclear operations. The U.S. was reported to have pressurized the government led by the Democratic Party of Japan last year not to open to the public the U.S.-Japan secret pacts on nuclear arms signed in 1960 and allow the port calls of the U.S. airplanes and warships carrying nukes. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This discloses once again the U.S. criminal scenario to realize its Korean and Asian strategy for aggression and its wild ambition to dominate the world by mounting preemptive nuclear attacks, regarding Japan and south Korea as its nuclear outposts.
					
					  It goes on:
					
					 Huge nuclear offensive means of the U.S. troops in Japan are aimed at carrying out its nuclear war strategy against the DPRK. 
					
					 The pressure put by the U.S. upon Japan to allow the former's airplanes and warships to enter it anytime regardless of whether they are carrying nukes or not is part of its military adventure to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK. 
					
					 It is the ulterior intention of the U.S. to use Japan as a nuclear offensive base and strategic stronghold in its operations against the DPRK and its neighboring countries. The U.S. seeks to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK, taking advantage of its nuclear edge in a bid to seize the whole of the Korean Peninsula and, furthermore, put Asia and the rest of the world under its domination and control. The U.S. warmongers are making reckless efforts to carry out its dangerous strategy for a nuclear war, overconfident of its nuclear arsenal, pushing the situation on the peninsula to an extreme phase. This cannot be construed otherwise than a very serious development.

articles.title: Anniversary of Letter to Koreans in Japan Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Letter to Koreans in Japan Observed
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates an article to the 16th anniversary of general secretary Kim Jong Il's letter "On Developing the Movement of Koreans in Japan onto New Higher Stage". Kim Jong Il sent the letter to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and Korean residents in Japan on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of Chongryon.
					 It clarifies the issue of protecting the democratic national rights and interests of Koreans in Japan, developing national education and preserving national character and the issue of defending the socialist homeland and making a tangible contribution to the prosperity of the country. It also deals with the issue of waging a more dynamic movement for national reunification and energetically conducting external information service and activities in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 The letter serves as the most scientific and just action program and a powerful ideological and theoretical weapon as it opened up an epochal phase of the movement of Koreans in Japan and firmly guaranteed its bright future, the article said, and went on:
					
					 After the publication of the letter, Chongryon developed into a militant organization, strong in ideology and unity.
					
					The patriotic line and nature of Chongryon have been invariably upheld, its core positions have grown stronger and the national rights of compatriots have been steadily cemented through various mass movements even under the conditions and situation where the anti-DPRK racket has been kicked up nonstop and harsh national chauvinist and inhuman acts to stamp out Chongryon have become pronounced.
					
					 The movement of Koreans in Japan will strikingly demonstrate its invincible might as long as there are the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il, the dignified DPRK demonstrating the ever-victorious spirit and might under the great banner of Songun and the powerful Chongryon organization single-mindedly united on the basis of patriotism.

articles.title: Favorite Dress Colors of Korean Women
articles.content:
Favorite Dress Colors of Korean Women
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Korean women like to wear chima (skirt) and jogori (coat) in all seasons. 
					 They used to put on white jogori and black chima in old days, but their colors became diverse to suit seasons.
					
					 They choose light pink, light maroon and yellow colors in spring and white and light blue colors in summer.  
					
					 They favor purple, deep blue and red colors in autumn and deep and comfortable colors in winter.

articles.title: Yonbaek Plain Associated with Kim Il Sung's Deep Concern for Farming
articles.content:
Yonbaek Plain Associated with Kim Il Sung's Deep Concern for Farming
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Rice-transplanting is in full swing in Yonbaek Plain in South Hwanghae Province, the DPRK.
					 President Kim Il Sung, who always paid close attention to the farming in the area, visited the Paechon County early in the morning in August Juche 82 (1993).
					
					 Making the rounds of rice fields, he was satisfied with a good crop of rice. He called for a comprehensive mechanization of agriculture in the county.
					
					 After taking a simple breakfast late, he continued the field guidance tour of Ohyon and Chonthae co-op farms in Yonan County and Chongjong Co-op Farm in Chongdan County.
					
					 That day, he said the nation's grain output plan set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea can be fulfilled only when South Hwanghae Province hits its target. 
					
					 Before leaving the province, he made a promise that he would come again next year.

articles.title: Song Conducive to Korean Liberation
articles.content:
Song Conducive to Korean Liberation
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Among the revolutionary songs created in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle is "Song of the ARF Ten-Point Programme".
					 President Kim Il Sung organized the ARF (Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland), the first anti-Japanese national united front body, in May Juche 25 (1936) and created the song to help the people understand its Ten-Point Programme.
					
					 The song, easy to sing and cheerful in melody, was popular among not only members of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) but also workers, peasants and other people.
					
					 The song simplifies the programme calling on all the Korean people to liberate the country and build a genuine country for the people with concerted efforts. Even illiterates could get a correct understanding of the immediate target and tasks of the Korean revolution through the song.
					
					 The famous song contributed to encouraging the KPRA members and all other Korean people with the validity of the revolutionary cause, confidence in victory and revolutionary optimism.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Cabinet Reshuffle under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Cabinet Reshuffle under Fire
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore carried an editorial on May 20 accusing the puppet authorities of carrying out a Cabinet reshuffle.
					 Referring to the announcement of the Cabinet reshuffle by Chongwadae on May 6, the editorial said that those who were informally designated as candidates for ministers are related to Lee Myung Bak privately.
					
					 Ryu Yong Suk, candidate for minister of Environment, has gone to the Somang Church since 2008 right after the appearance of the Lee Myung Bak regime, the editorial said, adding that there is strong argument about the nomination of Ryu despite her lack of knowledge about the environmental issue.
					
					 So Kyu Yong, candidate for minister of Agriculture, Forestry, Fishery and Foodstuff, was busy working for Lee Myung Bak as a special aide for external cooperation and permanent special aide for "presidential" candidate of the election measure committee of the "Grand National Party" in the past "presidential elections", it noted.
					
					 People sufficiently experienced how the present "government" failed in the state administration after the Cabinet was formed as a result of the unreasonable policy of personnel affairs, it said, accusing Lee of nominating only his close associates.

articles.title: Punishment of S. Korean Regime Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of S. Korean Regime Called for in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement on May 18, the 31st anniversary of the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 The Kwangju Popular Resistance in May, 1980 demonstrated before the world the indomitable spirit and will of the people to fight against subjugation and fascism, the statement said.
					
					 The patriotic people from all walks of life have waged a strenuous movement for independence against the U.S. and for national reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself" by inheriting the spirit of the resistance in those days, the statement said. 
					
					 South Korea is in the grip of a serious crisis due to Lee Myung Bak's unpopular rule and confrontation hysteria, it noted, and continued:
					
					 The prevailing emergency situation calls for resolutely shattering the treacherous and anti-reunification policy of Lee Myung Bak and paving the way for independent reunification with the stamina and justice of the Kwangju Popular Resistance.
					
					 It called upon all the people to get united in the struggle to punish the treacherous regime without fail.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Family Lauded by Personages of Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Family Lauded by Personages of Various Countries
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Personages of different countries lauded President Kim Il Sung's family when visiting his birthplace at Mangyongdae.
					 The Mangyongdae family is the patriotic and revolutionary family, said Tserendorj Ganbold, head of the friendship delegation of the Agency for the Diplomatic Corps Service of the Implementing Agency of the Government of Mongolia.
					
					  Kim Il Sung, born into this family, liberated Korea and turned it to a socialist power, he added.
					
					 The Mangyongdae family members are ardent patriots who devoted their all to the country and the people, said Dmitri Model, head of the delegation of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Seeing many people ceaselessly visit Kim Il Sung's old home in Mangyongdae, we deeply felt how deep the Korean people's reverence for him is, said Mohammad Shamsul Ikram, head of the delegation of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The President's whole life is shining as the history of a prominent revolutionary and great leader as he was born into the admirable family which had kept the spirit of patriotism and worked heart and soul for the country and the revolution till the last moments of his life, he stressed.
					
					 Subash Kaji Shrestha, head of the delegation of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, said: Mangyongdae where the sun of Juche rose is cherished in the hearts of all people.
					
					 The world progressives are praising as the eternal leader of mankind Kim Il Sung who made immortal contributions to hewing out the destiny of the nation and accomplishing the cause of global independence, he added.

articles.title: Contribution to Global Independence Urged in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Contribution to Global Independence Urged in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy called upon the adherents to the Juche idea, the Songun idea to make signal contribution to global independence with the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung as an occasion.
					 The group made this call in a statement issued on May 18 in support of the decision of the 13th enlarged meeting of the Executive Committee of the Board of Directors of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and the appeal to the Juche idea followers of the world adopted at the Latin American regional seminar on the Juche idea for the struggle for independence against imperialism in Latin America. 
					
					 The foundation of the Juche idea, the Songun idea by Kim Il Sung enabled the Korean revolution to always emerge victorious and provided the progressive mankind with the powerful ideological and theoretical weapon for national liberation and struggle against imperialism, the statement said.
					
					 It stressed that Kim Jong Il is the great leader as he has enriched the Juche idea and reliably defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation with the Songun politics based on the idea while wisely guiding the Korean people in the efforts to build a thriving nation.
					
					 The statement declared that the group would deeply grasp and zealously learn from the greatness and undying feats of Kim Jong Il and intensify its activities.

articles.title: Bulgarians to Strengthen Solidarity with Korean People
articles.content:
Bulgarians to Strengthen Solidarity with Korean People
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association declared that it would commemorate most significantly and splendidly the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung next year and conduct on a wider scale the activities of solidarity with the just cause of the Korean people.
					 This will was expressed at the general meeting for summing up the work of the Association on May 18.
					
					 Simeon Ignatov, chairman of the Association, made a report at the meeting, which was followed by speeches of several personages.
					
					 They noted that in the period from 2008 to 2011 under review the Association conducted various activities of introducing the exploits of the peerlessly great persons on such important occasions as birthdays of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the anniversary of the DPRK's foundation.
					
					 They also said that the Association expressed support and solidarity with the Korean people in their strenuous efforts for building of a thriving nation and national reunification, and referred to its future tasks.

articles.title: Nepali Newspaper on Juche Idea
articles.content:
Nepali Newspaper on Juche Idea
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The Nepali newspaper Arpan on May 13 carried an article under the title of "Juche-based outlook on world".
					 The Juche idea elucidated from a new angle the essential characteristics of man and the position and role of man in the world, thus establishing the man-centered outlook on the world, the article said, adding:
					
					 It is the new view on the world, given in relation with man, that the world is dominated and remolded by man.
					
					 The Juche idea clarified the viewpoint and attitude to the world on the basis of the position and role of man as the master of the world.
					
					 The Juche-based outlook on the world is the most perfect outlook on the world in the present times as it is based on the philosophical principle that man is master of everything and decides everything.
					
					 The position and role of the popular masses as the masters of the world are markedly rising now.
					
					 This reality more clearly proves the validity and vitality of the philosophical principle of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Declaration Supported in Nigeria
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Declaration Supported in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a statement on May 17 to mark the 11th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration was an event of weighty significance in achieving the co-prosperity by the united efforts of the Korean nation and providing prerequisite for the independent and peaceful reunification, the statement said.
					
					 After the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration the north and the south of Korea reconnected the severed railways and roads to make a breach in the barrier of division in the spirit of "By the Korean nation itself" and displayed the great unity of the nation through high-level talks and economic cooperation, it added.
					
					 But the Lee Myung Bak clique of south Korea orchestrated the "Cheonan" warship sinking and Yonphyong Island shelling cases to increase the danger of war, the statement pointed out, saying: Once a war breaks out in Korea it would be the first thermonuclear war in the world and spread throughout not only the Korean Peninsula but also the rest of the world.
					
					 The only way for peace and reunification of Korea is the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the north-south dialogue, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The Committee demands that the south Korean authorities accept the proposal for reunification by means of federation and promptly come out to the dialogue with the DPRK.

articles.title: Palestinian Presidency Says Israel Avoids Peacemaking
articles.content:
Palestinian Presidency Says Israel Avoids Peacemaking
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The Palestinian leadership on May 20 accused Israel of avoiding making peace in the Middle East.
					 The accusation was made after Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said he cannot withdraw Israeli troops from the Palestinian lands that have been occupied since 1967. 
					
					 "Netanyahu's position is an official declaration that he is not ready to engage in a real peace based on justice and international legitimacy," said Nabil Abu Rdineh, spokesman for the Palestinian presidency.

articles.title: 4 Killed in U.S. Drone Strike in Pakistan
articles.content:
4 Killed in U.S. Drone Strike in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces in Afghanistan are continuously committing killings of Pakistanis under the pretext of "anti-terrorism".
					 At least four people were killed as U.S. drones fired two missiles at a vehicle in the Miranshah area of North Waziristan in Pakistan Friday evening.

articles.title: More Cases of U.S. Forces' Burial of Toxic Materials Disclosed
articles.content:
More Cases of U.S. Forces' Burial of Toxic Materials Disclosed
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the U.S. forces present in south Korea buried other toxic materials in addition to defoliant in their base in Waegwan, Chilgok County, North Kyongsang Province, south Korean CBS said.
					 This was testified to by workers, who retired while working in the base.
					
					 They said that they had seen chemical materials marked with warning of radiation while at work in the base.
					
					 They noted they could not forget the poisonous smell to which they had been exposed at that time though several decades have passed since then, adding that defoliant was not the only thing which was buried in the base.
					
					 The fact that there was a chemical unit in the base, in particular, further increases the possibility of the crimes committed by the U.S. forces.
					
					 The disclosure of more crimes committed by the U.S. forces is arousing great concern not only among south Korean inhabitants around the base but also among all other members of the society.

articles.title: Building of Modern Armed Police Force Called for in China
articles.content:
Building of Modern Armed Police Force Called for in China
 Beijing, May 22 (KCNA) -- Guo Boxiong, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., and vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China, underscored the need to push forward the building of modern armed police force, while looking round the exhibition of successes made by armed mobile police unit in Beijing on May 17.  
					 He said that as an important component of the state armed forces, the armed police unit should firmly adhere to the fundamental principle to arm the soldiers with the socialist theoretical system with Chinese characteristics and provide the absolute leadership of the party to the unit while putting the ideological and political building above all.
					
					 He also stressed the need to strictly conduct exercises to be fully combat ready and enhance the overall supply ability of the unit and thus make contribution to preserving the stability of the state and the society as a whole.

articles.title: New Institute Founded in China
articles.content:
New Institute Founded in China
 Beijing, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Social Development Institute of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences was founded on May 17.
					 The objectives of the foundation are to deeply study and discuss major theories and practical problems about the social development in China according to the scientific outlook on development and contribute to theory innovation with steady-going survey and research successes.

articles.title: Putin Calls for Creating Unitary Economic Union
articles.content:
Putin Calls for Creating Unitary Economic Union
 Moscow, May 22 (KCNA) -- Russian Prime Minister Vladimir Putin at a recent press conference called on the countries of the Commonwealth of Independent States to create a unitary economic union till 2013.
					 The union can act according to unitary principles and regulations within a unitary legal framework after establishing a unanimous stance to settle social and economic issues in the member nations.

articles.title: Russia Chides U.S. Moves for Missile Shield
articles.content:
Russia Chides U.S. Moves for Missile Shield 
 Moscow, 22 (KCNA) -- Andrei Tretyak, director of the General Bureau for Operations of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, at a forum held on Friday accused the U.S. of its moves to build a missile shield in Europe.
					 He said that the missile shield now being deployed by the U.S. in Europe poses a potential threat to the Russian nuclear deterrence.
					
					 Russia has no plan to deploy elements of its missile defence system outside it, he said, adding that there is no such plan at present, too.

articles.title: Delegation of U.S. Department of State Here
articles.content:
Delegation of U.S. Department of State Here 
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the U.S. Department of State led by Robert King, special envoy for Human Rights and Humanitarian Issues, arrived here on Tuesday by air to consult humanitarian issues between the DPRK and the U.S.

articles.title: Work Published in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Work Published in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi newspaper Natun Bangla on May 16 carried the full text of general secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism".
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the idea that priority should be given to ideological work to successfully accomplish the socialist cause and the basic mission of this work is to model the whole of society on the socialist idea.
					
					 It also stresses that the ideological work should be conducted in principles and method suited to the intrinsic requirements of socialism.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela ambicion nuclear de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela ambicion nuclear de EE.UU.
 Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ATCC) -- De acuerdo con las versiones recientes de Asahi Shimbun, Estados Unidos obligo a Japon a tolerar las acciones militares que forman parte de la operacion nuclear. 
					 El rotativo especifico que EE.UU. presiono el ano pasado al gobierno del Partido Democratico de Japon para que no publicara el compromiso nuclear secreto hecho entre EE.UU. y Japon en la decada de 1960 y permitiera la entrada en cualquier momento en territorio japones de los aviones y buques norteamericanos cargados de armas nucleares.
					
					 De esta manera, EE.UU. expuso otra vez su intencion criminal de realizar a modo de ataque preventivo nuclear su agresiva estrategia sobre Corea y Asia y su ambicion de dominar el mundo, tomando a Japon y el Sur de Corea como bases avanzadas nucleares. 
					
					 Senala asi el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y prosigue:
					
					 Los enormes medios de ataque nuclear de EE.UU. concentrados en Japon estan relacionados estrechamente con la estrategia de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC.
					
					 La verdadera intencion de EE.UU. es utilizar a Japon como base de ataque nuclear y punto estrategico contra la RPDC y los paises vecinos.
					
					 El imperio pretende provocar la guerra nuclear anti-RPDC con el fin de tomar toda la Peninsula Coreana aprovechando su supremacia nuclear y a la larga, establecer el dominio y el control sobre Asia y el resto del mundo. 
					
					 Resulta muy grave que los belicistas norteamericanos, fanfarroneados de su fuerza nuclear, llevaran al extremo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana actuando desesperadamente para poner en practica su aventurera estrategia de guerra nuclear.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun conmemora 16o aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun conmemora 16o aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun difundio en su edicion de este martes un articulo individual dedicado al 16o aniversario de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Llevar el movimiento de los coreanos residentes en Japon a una etapa superior".
					 La obra se trata del mensaje del Dirigente enviado a la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y los compatriotas radicados en Japon, con motivo del 40o aniversario de la fundacion de la Chongryon, senala el articulo y continua:
					
					 La obra aclara varios temas como el de defender los derechos nacionales democraticos e intereses de los compatriotas en Japon, desarrollar la educacion nacional y mantener la nacionalidad, el de defender la patria socialista y hacer contribucion especial al desarrollo y la prosperidad de la patria, el de dinamizar el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria y profundizar la divulgacion y las actividades exteriores bajo el ideal de independencia, paz y amistad, etc.
					
					 El mensaje es el programa de lucha mas cientifico y justo y la poderosa arma ideo-teorica que abrio la fase trascendental del movimiento de coreanos residentes en Japon y aseguro su futuro maravilloso. 
					
					 Despues de publicado el mensaje, la Chongryon se ha fortalecido como organizacion combativa, unida y firme en lo ideologico. 
					
					 Aun en medio de la incesante campana anti-RPDC y las maniobras chovinistas e inhumanitarias para exterminar la Chongryon, esta organizacion vino defendiendo invariablemente su linea y caracter patrioticos y consolidando su base medular.
					
					 Ademas, se vieron consolidados constantemente los derechos nacionales de la comunidad coreana en Japon a traves de varios movimientos masivos.
					
					 Gracias a la extraordinaria guia del Dirigente, a la RPDC que exalta su impetu y poderio invencible con la gran bandera del Songun y a la Chongryon unida a base del patriotismo, el movimiento de los coreanos residentes en Japon saldra siempre victorioso.

articles.title: Colores favoritos de las coreanas para su vestimenta
articles.content:
Colores favoritos de las coreanas para su vestimenta
 Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ATCC) -- En estos dias primaverales, se distinguen por doquier las mujeres que andan en Chima y jogori (vestimenta tipica de las coreanas).
					 Desde la antiguedad, las coreanas prefirieron los colores claros y discretos que simbolizaban su caracter casto y suave.
					
					 Si bien les gustaban mas que otros colores el blanco para su jogori (blusa) y el negro para su chima (falda larga), cambiaban el colorido segun las estaciones del ano.
					
					 En la primavera se ponian vestidos rosado, marron claro, amarillo y de otros colores suaves y en el verano, escogian el blanco, azul claro y otros colores refrescantes.
					
					 En el otono preferian los colores frescos o de abundancia como violeta, caqui y rojizo y en el invierno, se vestian en colores densos y apacibles en contraste con el frio penetrante.
